root: ^(Fred seems to be staring out into space...)

Start: ^Fred! My favorite little star, how are you?
^How did it go with Frank! What did you do? Tell me everything!
^You seem to be more excited about this than me...
^Well I gave you advice, and I wanna know how it panned out!
^And as your friend, I am heavily invested in what happens to you!
^I was gonna make a joke but that's actualy just really nice!
^Let me get you a smoothie and you prep your story!
^Alrighty, there you go! Now dish what happened!
^Well I don't really know where to start...
^We went and watched the shows you recommended after work!
^Yeah! He talked a lot about stuff I didn't really understand...
^That's awesome, Fred! And did you talk about school and the suit, or the whole adoption situation?
^Whenever I bring it up he goes quiet and I don't know what to do
^He seemed to be enjoying himself and talking about the characters he liked when he was growing up though
^(Dam I don't know whether to praise the obersevation or critize him avoiding the conversation)
^Thats actually really thoughtful of you Fred
^Well when are you planning on asking him?
^Fred even if he says no its better knowing

c-0: ^I love that you care about Frank so much but if you are going to move forward in your life you need to do it right?
^If he says yes you could instantly have a Dad who cares very deeply about you and who is willing and parently obiligated to help you with your situation.
^Giving him the benefit of the doubt for not knowing about your situation and caring enough to work basically 20 hours a day to help you I think he could be a really great parent
^He is really nice and we like a lot of the same stuff
^Exactly! And think about it he gets paid so as long as he is somewhat responable with his money he should be able to pay for you to go to school! and you can make friends your own age!
^What do you do think you would want to do first?
c-1: ^Well do you still want to ask him?
^Fred your scaring my little clueless star speak in more than three words
^Well, I had fun with him right
^Yes? I feel a but coming after that
^but what you said earlier got me thinking
^Well do you remember what you first said me to when I mentioned Frank worked with me before?
c-2: ^Just remember even if he ends up being a dead end for adoption its still better to ask now versus later so you can find someone to help you sooner than later
^And that way you aren't stuck working at Ums for another hundred years getting paid nothing for wearing a suit that does nothing

^Everything you have been saying has kind of been making sense
^The work thing, Ums is sadly my life right now
^And Im not sure I want that
^But I don't know if he is worth spending all my time working at Ums great
^And remember what I said a few days ago, you have other opitions for people that care for you, and its better to leave Ums and that whole suit business behind anyways

^but speaking of caring for you did find out more about the two mysterious people you mentioned before?

^The more you talk about them using me the more I notice things they say at work are bad
^And your right this suit isn't my world
^Even if it is fun to wear I can get another one right!

GoodEnding: ^Continue ot work at UMS with Frank

c-0: ^I think it would be nice to be working with Frank more

^Never let them take advantage of you again! Espically now with Frank in your corner you should be untouchable by those coperate bastards!

c-1: ^a lot of my co workers never went to school but they got jobs

^BUTTTT it is still important you go for the social aspect!

^plus you can learn about anything you want! If you want to learn more about stars you can do that! You can even learn about history, languages, math thought its not really fun for most people, anything you want to at all!
^ok! if you think its the right thing to do I don't see why not

^Don't worry about it its just a saying
^But isn't that math, I thought you didn't like math?
^You are going to make some poor underpaid teachers day with all these questions
^Ok! So once I go to school what do I do after that?
c-2: ^Fred you have been working for hundreds of years!
^Most kids don't work till they are older or have had some sort of education or learned a trade
^And think about it, you could do whatever you want for a few years to relax after working for a suit you should have paid off hundreds of years ago!
^You could watch cartoons, play with other kids, go out and talk with people whenever you want, eat whateever you want, go wherever you want, really just have fun!
^It very much is Fred! You missed out on a lot of kid shennigans, might not be a bad idea to enjoy life with Frank for a little bit
^Earth has some great Theme parks and carnivals you could go to!
^Massive thruster propelled carts that shoot you around the sky using only small metal railings to keep you in place on a winding track
^oh, that kind of sounds scary not fun
^Well it is in concept but it is actually really fun when you try it, some even go to the moon and back!
^See! And you and Frank could bond over all of that and make some really nice memories!
^You seem to think its fun, so I think it will be too!
^I feel like a proud teacher whos student is graduating from
^But after all the coasters and parks what do I after?

GoodFinal: ^After you are done with everything you want, there will always be me here for bits of amazing life changing advice, and Frank will be there to take care of you
^Don't worry about your entire future now, enjoy the present and do whatever you think is best, even if you chose wrong you will have thousands of chances to chose right in your life little star
^And what happens if I don't have enough time to visit, or if Frank takes me somewher else?
^Well Fred, here at the portal diner we have a saying do you know what that is?
^No matter where you are or what you desire, we are just a wormhole away
^Thanks Graciana, I think I had a lot of fun talking to you

c-0: ^Me too little star, make sure you visit every so often to keep me up to date on how your doing alright?
^Well I have to go tell Frank the good news and ask him a very important question!
^(Fred gives you a quick hug before running off towards a portal and diving head first into the swirling vortex that leads to Ums headquarters)
^Shit I'm going to miss that kid
^(Stares off into the distance as a Ums ship soars past the diner in the distance)
^I'm really going to miss that little star
^(a few months go by before a tall lanky figure in a Ums uniform comes in asking for you by name)
^(his presence is somewhat mysterious and you feel certain there is something strange about him)

^(But he carries a gentle smile and a relaxed tone as he thanks you for helping Fred and he steps to the side to reveal Fred holding a sign that says Part time Certified UMS Employee, Student, and full time Fred.)

c-0: ^(You watch in horror as Fred rips the suit clean off causing a blinding white light to fill the Diner, a loud ringing takes over your hearing and you fall to the ground in confusion)
^(As you stand up you lookaround to see the Penguin suit lying on the ground in shreds and Fred is no longer standing before you)
^(You frantically look left right up down and he is nowhere to be found, just an empty Penguin suit)
^(You reach down and grasp the suit as you look out into the darkness of space unsure of what you have just done)
^(Out in the stars you see a new constillation staring back at you, as a series of small stars forming the confused and somewhat saddened face of Fred staring across the comsos in his true star form)

^(You think about what you have just done, and it sinks in almost immeaditly, you were the direct cause of this poor boys fate, for the rest of your shift you spend your time letting the guilt wash over you as you stare off into the frightened Fred's constellation made face)
